headline: Does Reviving Halo Ram Trucks Reshape The Performance Pickup Thesis For Stellantis (BIT:STLAM)?
summary: Earlier this month, Ram, a Stellantis brand, unveiled the 2027 Ram 1500 SRT TRX and the first-ever 2027 Ram Power Wagon with Cummins turbo diesel, reintroducing high-performance gas and heavy-duty diesel pickups with segment-leading power, off-road capability and advanced driver-assistance technology. By reviving iconic V-8 and Cummins diesel nameplates at price points near US$100,000, Stellantis is reinforcing Ram’s halo truck portfolio at the very top of the performance and heavy-duty...
